00042         AppliedVector changeRef(Point2od newReference, AppliedVector p);
00043         
00044         template<class X>
00045         std::vector<X> changeRef(Point2od newReference, const std::vector<X>& vec ) {
00046             std::vector<X> temp;
00047             for(size_t a=0;a<vec.size();a++) 
00048                 temp.push_back(changeRef(newReference, vec[a]));
00049             return temp;
00050         }
00051 
00052         template<class X>
00053         void changeRef(Point2od newReference, const std::vector<X>& vec, std::vector<X> &out ) {
00054             for(size_t a=0;a<vec.size();a++) 
00055                 out.push_back(changeRef(newReference, vec[a]));
00056         }
00057 
00059         AppliedVector local2world(Point2od ref, AppliedVector p);
00060         
00062         Point2od local2world(Point2od ref, Point2od p);
00063 
00064         template<class X>
00065         void local2world(Point2od ref, const std::vector<X>& vec, std::vector<X> &out ) {
00066             for(size_t a=0;a<vec.size();a++) 
00067                 out.push_back(local2world(ref, vec[a]));
00068         }
